org.kaaproject.kaa.client.schema.storage

Interface SchemaPersistenceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSchemaPersistenceManager

    public interface SchemaPersistenceManager
    Manager that saves and loads the schema

    Provide SchemaStorage implementation instance to store updates for configuration schema. Once setSchemaStorage(SchemaStorage) is called SchemaStorage.loadSchema() will be invoked to load persisted configuration schema.
    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman
    See Also:
    SchemaStorage

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setSchemaStorage(SchemaStorage storage)
      Provide storage object which is able to persist configuration schema.

                      throws IOException
        Provide storage object which is able to persist configuration schema.
        Parameters:
        storage - object that saves and loads schema data
        Throws:
        IOException
